snippet.title: Feedback: Politics and the Internet Dog
snippet.description: A couple of weeks ago, I wrote about "The Last Days of Politics," particularly the surreal, archaic vibes coming off the presidential campaign. I said I'd be posting some responses. Here are a very few excerpts, reprinted with permission, and thanks for them. (Make sure to check out "The Internet Dog" proposal for a virtual George Washington) If you want to keep the e-mail coming, I'll keep the discussion going.
